snippet: Rob Astorino, the Westchester County executive, began his bid to unseat Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, a Democrat, in a heavily Democratic borough of New York City: the Bronx.
abstract: Westchester County Executive Rob Astorino begins campaign for New York State governor's seat and bid to unseat Andrew M Cuomo; appearing in Bronx, Astorino offers polished critique of the man he wants to unseat, lamenting the flight of people and businesses in New York, and condemning Cuomo administration as failure.
lead_paragraph: Rob Astorino, the Westchester County executive, began his bid to unseat Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, a Democrat, in a heavily Democratic borough of New York City: the Bronx.

headline.main: Westchester Leader Begins Campaign for Governor
headline.print_headline: Westchester Leader Begins Campaign for Governor
